text: 5.19: Sng 33.2-3; FG 16.25; 1 Ko 14.265.19: Kor 3.16-17Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde wari phorgɨp buni suaŋv, nde Ŋgavi Ki Gavar ŋgavi, gum rotu mbui ŋgavi, gu Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nde ndavi khavav nde ndɨɨi ŋgavi, nde mba ŋgavir wari won buni phorgɨp mbe suaŋri. Nde vhɨra Guma Bakɨme suaŋv, nde wari wo kaathoori gum wari won ndavi vherir ana zɨ ndi vun kuamkuav, ana suaŋv ŋgavir muuŋri.
